section.name: Long-term trend
section.page: In this diagram, you can drag a line to describe linear trend in a time series and estimate its parameters by least squares. The diagram also shows that 'year' can be replaced by (year - xxx) to make the coefficients smaller.
This diagram is similar to the one above but allows a quadratic curve to be fitted to describe the trend..
In this diagram, a linear or quadratic model can be used to forecast into the future.
